docs.snippet: Tuck, a defensive end who was a stalwart of two Super Bowl victories with the Giants, accepted a contract worth $11 million to join a team that finished 4-12 each of the last two seasons....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tuck, a defensive end who was a stalwart of two Super Bowl victories with the Giants, accepted a contract worth $11 million to join a team that finished 4-12 each of the last two seasons.
docs.abstract: Justin Tuck, a defensive end whose pass-rushing skills and leadership helped the New York Giants to two NFL championships, signs with Oakland Raiders; two year deal is worth $11 million.

headline.main: Giants’ Justin Tuck Takes Two-Year Deal With Raiders
headline.print_headline: Tuck Takes Two-Year Deal With Raiders

docs.snippet: Wide receiver Eric Decker immediately improves Geno Smith and the Jets, but the deal comes with subtle nagging questions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Eric Decker immediately improves Geno Smith and the Jets, but the deal comes with subtle nagging questions.
docs.abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Football column holds that New York Jets' acquisition of wide receiver Eric Decker immediately improves Geno Smith and team, but says deal does come with red flags for Jets fans, starting with question of why Denver never even made Decker an offer to keep him on their roster.

headline.main: Jets Will Need Their Big Catch to Grab His Opportunity
